summary: This is a brief email from July 7, 2019, noting that attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg will be appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the following day. The sender, an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York, indicates they will receive information from the 'Buffalo team'.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Identified as appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the day after this email was sent.

persons.name: Marty Weinberg
persons.context: Identified as appearing alongside Reid Weingarten on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the day after this email was sent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The client whom attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are representing in court.

connections.description: Weingarten is appearing in court on behalf of Epstein as his defense attorney.
Weinberg is appearing in court on behalf of Epstein as his defense attorney.
Both attorneys are appearing together on behalf of the same client, Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Court Appearance for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Defense attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are scheduled to appear in court on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On July 7, 2019, an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY noted that high-profile attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg would be representing Jeffrey Epstein in court the next day.
The email indicates coordination between the SDNY prosecution team and a 'Buffalo team' regarding the Epstein case.
The document shows Epstein had secured prominent legal representation for court proceedings in July 2019.
